name: Charms $5 [4-pack $15]
description: Charms will ship after 1/23/12-1/25/12. Colorful 1.5"-1.75" acrylic charms feature the main cast. Printed on 1/16" lasercut acrylic and laminated for protection from surface damage and degradation of the image. Each charm is fitted with a matching strap and a lobster clasp -- both removable, providing multiple options to hang, display or wear them. The charm and strap/clasp are held together by a custom-ordered steel jump ring. Each charm will come with a resealable package for storage and display for any collectors out there. Custom acrylic charms produced by Printsess. Steel jump rings commissioned from Dave Cain. Assembling and packaging by me (Amanda Lafrenais). Note: If you decide to attach this to a keychain, do not attach it by the jump/O ring alone or the charm's hole -- doing so will increase the likelihood of it getting stuck, caught and/or breaking.
